survey_name: Home Office Setup and Productivity Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how employees set up their home offices and the impact on their productivity and comfort.

questions.question_text: How many days per week do you typically work from home?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for ease of selection. Ensure options cover common remote work frequencies.

script.question_text: How many days per week do you typically work from home?

questions.question_text: Which of the following equipment do you use in your home office setup? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.

script.question_text: Which of the following equipment do you use in your home office setup? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ergonomic comfort of your home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for better measurement of comfort levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ergonomic comfort of your home office setup?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face with your current home office setup? (Open-ended)
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to describe challenges in their own words. Use a text area for longer responses.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face with your current home office setup? (Open-ended)
